title: How to Make Chinese Green Tea

steps.headline: Put 5-10 grams of tea leaves in the tea pot.
Wait 3 - 5 minutes, then serve.
steps.description: You will get a few cups of fresh tea for yourself.

methods.name: Using More Leaves to Serve for 4 More People

steps.headline: Add 20 - 30 grams of  tea leaves into the tea pot.
Wait 3 - 5 minutes and then pour to serve for yourself or guest.

text: Using a Few Leaves Put 5-10 grams of tea leaves in the tea pot.  Add not-quite-boiling (80-90°) water.  Wait 3 - 5 minutes, then serve. You will get a few cups of fresh tea for yourself. Using More Leaves to Serve for 4 More People Add 20 - 30 grams of  tea leaves into the tea pot.  Add not-quite-boiling (80-90°) water.  Wait 3 - 5 minutes and then pour to serve for yourself or guest.
